body:
All Versions

  • Compare Networks: Added an Overlap tab on Specialty Group Details page, showing Overlap and Exclusive for base network and one comparison network.
  • Compare Networks: Added Network Counts by Specialty export to csv option.
  • Compare Networks: Added Network Counts by Geography export to csv option.
  • Compare Networks: Added thumbnails of report examples to Custom Export.
  • Recruitment: Fixed an issue when changing criteria.
  • Measure Disruption: Tile navigates to previous version to allow access to True Disruption.
  • Custom logos: Added tab in Settings to select logo for reporting
